answers.answer: Hi there!Semen does not show up as protein in urine, even when directly mixed with it. I would suggest going ahead with the evaluation suggested by your doctor. After a cause to the proteinuria is identified, it can be managed accordingly.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: I am a straight acting gay man, my doctor doesnt know I am gay.  I have type 2 diabetes so get blood and urine tests every 6 months.  Recently my urine test showed excess protien in the urine which leads my doctor to believe it may be an early indication of a kidney issue, I think it may be from me swallowing my boyfriends semen.  My question: How long will semen show up as protien in a urine test?
title: excess protien in urine
